name: Music_3315.wav
keywords: ['flute song', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'no percussion', 'no other instruments', 'meditation music', 'relaxing music']
caption: This instrumental song features a flute playing a high pitched melody. The melody starts off with one high pitched staccato note. After a brief pause, the flute plays two ascending notes in which the second note is sustained. Then a third higher note is played followed by a descending run of four more notes and ending on one higher note. There are no other instruments in this song. There is no percussion in this song. This song has a relaxing mood. This song can be played at a meditation center.
